授業目的: The purpose of this course is to provide a deeper understanding of research in marketing and consumer behavior.
到達目標:
- Students will develop the ability to critically examine and discuss relevant research topics in marketing and consumer behavior.
- Students will acquire a practical understanding of research that meets the professional quality standard.

トピック.授業計画1: This course will review and discuss research interests in marketing and consumer behavior. Individual discussions focus on critical reviews of the theoretical and practical aspects of marketing and understand challenges faced by marketing researchers and practitioners.
トピック.授業外学習2: The students will be required to obtain relevant articles to their research interests. They should contact the instructor if there is any need to access specific research material. Class preparations beyond the assigned readings are encouraged to broaden understanding and contribute constructively to all discussions.

評価.教科書Required texts0: There is no prescribed text; specific readings will be assigned based on each student's research interest.
